thread.title: Spotted: Alexis Sanchez laughing in Liverpool defeat but Arsenal team-mate is not amused
thread.title_full: Spotted: Alexis Sanchez laughing in Liverpool defeat but Arsenal team-mate is not amused

title: Spotted: Alexis Sanchez laughing in Liverpool defeat but Arsenal team-mate is not amused
text:
1 of 8 Click to reveal the best snaps of Alexis Sanchez laughing on the Arsenal bench 
Alexis Sanchez was under scrutiny yesterday after being dropped for Arsenal's clash with Liverpool at Anfield, and fans didn't like what they saw from him. 
The Chilean superstar was spotted smirking and laughing during the first half as his team went 2-0 down on Merseyside. 
One teammate in particular didn't look impressed with Sanchez's antics.
